statements: SELECT * FROM shipment_tracking WHERE shipment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT shipment_id, delivery_location, estimated_arrival_time FROM shipment_tracking WHERE is_delivered = FALSE;
SELECT pickup_location, current_location FROM shipment_tracking WHERE estimated_arrival_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM shipment_tracking WHERE delivery_location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT shipment_id, delivery_location FROM shipment_tracking ORDER BY shipment_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM shipment_tracking WHERE estimated_arrival_time < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ORDER BY estimated_arrival_time DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, delivery_location, current_location FROM shipment_tracking WHERE is_delivered = FALSE;
SELECT pickup_location, delivery_location FROM shipment_tracking WHERE pickup_location = 'New York' ORDER BY shipment_id;
SELECT * FROM shipment_tracking WHERE is_delivered = TRUE AND delivery_location LIKE 'Los Angeles%';
SELECT current_location, COUNT(*) AS total_shipments FROM shipment_tracking GROUP BY current_location ORDER BY total_shipments DESC;
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE status = 'Delivered';
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_name, destination_location FROM shipments ORDER BY shipment_id DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, current_location FROM shipments WHERE status IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM shipments_history WHERE TIMESTAMP > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, shipment_id, location, status FROM shipments_history ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE status = 'delivered';
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_name, current_location FROM shipments WHERE destination_location = 'New York' ORDER BY current_location ASC;
SELECT shipment_id, MAX(timestamp) as last_updated FROM shipments_history GROUP BY shipment_id;
SELECT shipment_name, status, current_location FROM shipments WHERE status = 'in-transit' ORDER BY current_location DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_shipments FROM shipments WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE shipment_id = 1;
SELECT shipment_name, destination_location FROM shipments WHERE delivery_status = 'in-transit';
SELECT current_location, destination_location FROM shipments WHERE shipment_name LIKE '%fragile%';
SELECT * FROM tracking_history WHERE location_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT shipment_name, delivery_status FROM shipments ORDER BY delivery_status DESC;
SELECT * FROM shipments
SELECT shipment_name, destination_location FROM shipments WHERE delivery_status='In Transit'

SELECT shipments.shipment_id, tracking_history.timestamp, locations.location_name FROM shipments JOIN tracking_history ON shipments.shipment_id = tracking_history.shipment_id JOIN locations ON tracking_history.location_id = locations.location_id WHERE shipments.shipment_id = 1
SELECT shipment_name, current_location, delivery_status FROM shipments WHERE current_location='Warehouse A' ORDER BY shipment_name DESC
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_name, destination_location, current_location, delivery_status FROM shipments
SELECT * FROM shipments;
SELECT shipment_id, shipper_name, destination_address FROM shipments WHERE shipper_name='Amazon';
SELECT driver_id, driver_name FROM drivers ORDER BY driver_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT route_id, shipment_id, driver_id, vehicle_id, start_location FROM route_history WHERE start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-12-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM shipments LIMIT 10;
SELECT shipper_name, destination_address FROM shipments WHERE shipment_id = 1001;
SELECT shipper_name, current_location FROM shipments ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT driver_name, driver_license, current_location FROM drivers JOIN vehicles ON drivers.driver_id = vehicles.driver_id;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, start_time, end_time FROM route_history WHERE start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM shipments;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, tracking_code FROM shipments WHERE delivery_status='Delivered';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(shipment_id) AS total_shipments FROM shipments GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT c.customer_name, s.tracking_code, l.location_name FROM customers c INNER JOIN shipments s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id INNER JOIN locations l ON s.current_location = l.location_id;
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE delivery_status='Delivered';
SELECT shipment_id, order_id, customer_id, current_location FROM shipments WHERE customer_id=1001 ORDER BY shipment_id DESC;
SELECT s.shipment_id, s.tracking_code, c.customer_name, c.address FROM shipments s JOIN customers c ON s.customer_id=c.customer_id WHERE s.delivery_status='In Transit' ORDER BY s.shipment_id ASC;
SELECT sh.shipment_id, l.location_name, sh.timestamp, sh.status FROM shipment_history sh JOIN locations l ON sh.location_id=l.location_id WHERE sh.status='Processing' LIMIT 5;
SELECT o.order_id, c.customer_name, o.order_date, o.total_amount, o.payment_status FROM orders o JOIN customers c ON o.customer_id=c.customer_id ORDER BY o.total_amount DESC;
